title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Usability Optimization of e-Learning Materials for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize social issue-solving materials provided by e-learning platforms with over 90% usability satisfaction.
Learners can identify over 80% of usability issues in e-learning materials by applying heuristic evaluation criteria.
Learners propose solutions to improve over 70% of identified usability issues through project-based activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
